content: hey jammers
tara monixic here i work at netlify on the angular developer experience
engineering and i'm an angular google developer
expert i'm here today to talk to you about the
best the number one the only angular static
site generator scully so scully just had its big
v1 release it's official it's released it's here for you uh one of the best
things about scully is you're just writing angular so if you
want to be able to use markdown files and use pre-rendering
for your application and you're already using angular you can
continue to write in angular by using scully to
pre-render your application schooly even makes use of angular
schematics to help you make that process even smoother and
build out your site even faster skully also has a flexible
and extensible plug-in system this way you're able to make your
own kind of functionality inside of skully
or go off different plugins made in the community
to help you do things that a lot of people in the community have also found
they need to do there are different ones like minify
html and lazy images and sitemap plugins to really help you jump start your
application and your angular projects and bring them into the jam stack if
skully is a new concept to you and you are very excited to bring your
angular application into the jam stack there's actually a great free
webinar on thinkster given to you by the co-creator of scully aaron frost
and you can check it out at this link here
if though you have been following on this journey and
know so much about scully or know some things about scully
and just want to learn all the new updates there's actually a video on
youtube that you can check out with the core team of the scully group
at hero devs that walk you through all the latest
updates that have been happening and that have happened for
this v1 launch of scully as always i'm here to
answer any questions you can find me at tcmanix on twitter
and i am still trying to make jam dealer happen so thanks for joining me on the
skully update you
